title: Xscape Women's Long Sleeve V-Neck Floral Skirted Gown (Reg and Petite)
description: Model is wearing a size 4 dress. Size 4 measures approximately 61 1/2" from shoulder to hem.
Fits true to size for a perfect, comfortable fit.
Can be worn with any standard bra for easy, everyday comfort.
This dress is fitted at the waist and loosely fitted at the hips. The fabric has some stretch.
The bold cutouts and floral skirt blend modern edge with classic sophistication, making this gown a show-stopper.

This elegant gown combines a fitted V-neck bodice with long sleeves and a flowing floral applique skirt. Featuring subtle side cutouts and a front slit, it blends sophistication with a modern edge, perfect for formal occasions.
